summary: This is an email correspondence from Bobbi C. Sternheim, likely an attorney, to Christian Everdell and Mark S. Cohen, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell (referenced by a number 02879-509). The email appears to be part of legal communications concerning Maxwell's case, forwarded to a USAHUB email address for journaling purposes.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 29, 2020, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell.
Bobbi C. Sternheim appears to be a key attorney communicating about Maxwell's case.
The email is copied to attorneys Christian Everdell and Mark S. Cohen, suggesting a legal team is involved.
Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced with an identifier (02879-509), typical for inmate or case management numbers.
The email was forwarded to 'USAHUB-USAJournal111', indicating it was captured for legal journaling or record-keeping purposes.
